question: Which among the following is incorrect regarding Coffee Krishi Tharanga?
option1: Coffee KrishiTharanga services are aimed at providing customized information and services to increase productivity
option2: It was implemented in Chikmagalur and Hassan districts of Karnataka State covering 30,000 farmers
explanation: Coffee KrishiTharanga services are aimed at providing customized information and services to increase productivity. It was implemented in Chikmagalur and Hassan districts of Karnataka State covering 30,000 farmers. NABARD has funded the project.
